member.name: T:TsdLib.Measurements.MeasurementBase
member.summary: Base class for all Measurement implementations. Defines members required to serialize to xml and/or binary.

member.summary: Initialize a new Measurement object.

Magnitude of the measurement.
Unit of measure.

Maximum inclusive value of the acceptable range of values for the measurement.
OPTIONAL: An array of absolute paths of files to attach.

OPTIONAL: A collection of MeasurementParameter objects describing the measurement conditions.

member.name: M:TsdLib.Measurements.TestResultCollection.SaveBinary(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Save the test results to a binary file. Useful when storing in-progress tests that can be recalled later.
member.param: A object representing the directory to save the test results file to.
member.returns: The absolute path to the binary file generated.

member.summary: Save the test results to an xml file in the specified directory. Useful for uploading to database.
